filters.deletedFilter: function(doc, req) { if(doc._deleted) { return false; }  else { return true; }}
filters.exclude_design_docs: function(doc, req) { if(doc._id.startsWith('_design/')) { return false; }  else { return true; }}
filters.lookups: function(doc, req) { const LOOKUP_TYPES = ["program", "species", "port", "vessel"]; return LOOKUP_TYPES.indexOf(doc.type) != -1;}
